text:
Hi,

When I enabled LoadModule ssl_module modules/mod_ssl.so in httpd.conf and restart the apache server.

The following error occurs:

/usr/local/apache/httpd-2.4.23/bin/apachectl: line 79:  6110 Segmentation fault $HTTPD -k $ARGV


In sever i have install Apache and Openssl

Apache : httpd-2.4.23

Openssl: OpenSSL 1.1.0 25 Aug 2016

Note the both packages installed locally using configure, make and make install

Please, help to fix this?
creator: b.hamichi@gmail.com
